EmailTemplate.name: Partner Pre-Qual Fail HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Pre-Qualification: {!Opportunity.Name} Failed to Meet Criteria
EmailTemplate.textOnly: At this time the applicant file for {!Opportunity.Account} (ID#: {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c}) fails to meet the Pre-Qualification criteria. If you have any questions please contact the Business Development team at RapidAdvance: bd@rapidadvance.com or 1-877-889-1037.
